direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with the auto-repay-futures status, one for querying and the other for setting.
Both methods involve sending signed requests with similar parameter handling and HTTP methods.
Both methods involve operations related to portfolio margin and futures account interactions.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the request handler is required before any request can be sent.
Setting the auto-repay-futures status should be tested before querying it.
Both methods involve handling responses and verifying their correctness.
